entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued January 10 at 1:21PM AKST by NWS
entry.summary: ...Gusty Winds and Blowing Snow Over Dalton Highway Summits... East to northeast winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts to 35 mph will continue through Wednesday on Dalton Highway Summits.
